resources.string: You are helping to protect yourself and others
You need to enable Bluetooth for eRouška to work properly
You need to enable Location Services for eRouška to work properly
You need to turn off the battery saver for eRouška to work properly.
The application is paused. Please remember to resume it.
The application is running and collecting anonymous IDs from phones near you.
We can\'t collect IDs from phones near you without Bluetooth.\n\nTurn it on with \"Enable Bluetooth\".

We can\'t collect IDs from phones near you without Location Services.\n\nWe don\'t actually use location data, but we need this permission in Android for running Bluetooth scans. Please turn it on with \"Turn on Location Services\".
Turn on Bluetooth and Location Services

We can\'t collect IDs from phones near you without Bluetooth and Location Services.\n\nWe don\'t actually use location data, but we need this permission in Android for running Bluetooth scans. Please turn them on with \"Enable BT and Location Services\".
The app is running in background and is scanning for nearby IDs using Bluetooth. Please don\'t turn off Bluetooth and keep using your phone as usual.
The app is currently paused and is no longer scanning for other IDs using Bluetooth.\n\nPlease resume scanning to protect you and your neighborhood. Remember to do this before leaving your home.
We will contact you at %s when flagged as infected. We will ask you to send an anonymized list of phones, which you can find in My Data.
Thank you for helping to fight the spread of coronavirus.\n\nPlease work with the local health authorities to find all the people you have been close to.
I was contacted by the local health authorities
Your device does not support Bluetooth LE
Please allow the app to access Bluetooth and your location
This app does not track or record your location, but we need this permission in Android for running Bluetooth scans.
Never turn off Bluetooth for this app to work properly.
This application never sends the collected data by itself. Anonymized data about phones near you will only be sent if you instruct it to do so by pressing the \"Send Data\" button.

The application uses Bluetooth to track phones that are nearby and also have the application installed.

It then stores the scanned IDs from other users locally on your phone.

Data will only be sent to our servers if you test positive for the infection.

Only send data when you\'re instructed to do so by the local health authorities.

We generate an ID and pair it with your phone number.

You may get contacted by the local health authorities on this phone number if you are in a group of people suspected of being infected with coronavirus.

What happens with the IDs I collect from other users near me?

The list of collected IDs are stored locally on your phone, and it will be only sent when you instruct the app to do so. You should only do that when instructed by the local authorities

This application must keep running in background. However, some phones stop background applications to save battery power. You need to add this app to the list of apps allowed to run in background.

Instructions for your phone

Who runs this app?

This app is run by volunteers from several Czech companies under the auspices and supervision of XYZ.
Only the local health authorities can contact you on this phone number if a coronavirus infection is confirmed near you.
I have read and, by activation, I agree to the terms of processing personal data during an emergency.
Error contacting server. Check your data network connection.
Too many phone number verification attempts. You can try again in a few hours.
The code has expired. Submit a new code and enter it in 3 minutes.

In this table you will find all records of the IDs of other eRouška users found via Bluetooth. This data does not contain the location nor personal information and will be only sent when you choose to. Records older than %d days are automatically deleted.
Location access permission is required for this app to work properly.
For more information on why this is needed, please see the Help section.

This app collects anonymous IDs from phones near you.

When a person that has been close to you at some point tests positive, the local health authorities will be able to contact you.

If you test positive for the infection yourself, the local authorities can contact people who have been close to you at some point.
We sent an SMS with a verification code to %s.
The verification code was automatically pre-filled.
Do you suspect you might be infected by the coronavirus?\n\nStay at home and contact your health care provider.

Do you need help?

Please check your local health authorities resources for more information.
Do you have a suggestion to improve this application or a question about how it works?
There is no email client installed.
The data has been successfully uploaded, and now the local health authorities can access it.
You have already submitted data. You will be able to resubmit data in %d minutes.
Have you been asked by a local health authority to send the data collected by this application?\n\nSubmitted data will be handled by the local health authorities.

Hi, I\'m using eRouška. Install it too and let\'s help stop the spread of coronavirus. The app collects anonymous data on nearby phones so that the local health authorities can locate potentially infected people. The more we are, the better it will work. You can find it here %s.
Are you sure you want to delete the data collected?\n\nHealth authorities will lose the opportunity to warn people that might have been in contact with you if you get infected.

Are you sure you want to unregister your phone number?

If someone that's been in contact with you tests positive for the infection, we won't be able to contact you.

If you test positive yourself, we won't be able to contact people that might have been in contact with you.

This action will disable this app on all devices registered with the phone number %s.
Failed to upload the collected data to the servers. Please try again later.
Your device does not have an active Internet connection at this moment.
Your account no longer exists, you have been signed out.
